item.title: From Finland to the Netherlands by bicycle
item.description: One could say that I grew up cycling. Some of my earlier memories are of me learning to cycle in Purmerend, 20 kilometers or so to the north of Amsterdam. I remember later on trying to break my speed records while checking my speedometer, which at the time (the early 1970s) was a large handlebar mounted contraption. During my teens I road-raced and I have basically enjoyed cycling my whole life.

item.title: Services
item.description: Level 1 coaching plan Athlete profile Absolute beginner Duration 1 month What you get Consultation where we’ll evaluate your level of fitness, your goals, and potential scheduling issues Basic training plan (25 - 50 kilometers per week) After 2 weeks evaluation and, if needed, training plan update Price €50 Level 2 coaching plan Athlete profile You are no longer an absolute beginner and want to take basic endurance building to the next level Duration 1 month What you get Consultation where we’ll evaluate your level of fitness and your goals Structured workout plan designed to match your fitness level and tailored to your cycling goals (50 - 100 kilometers per week) Training zones based on MHR or RPE Weekly evaluation and, if needed, training plan update Device file data analysis (if available) Price €100 Location based Basic bike-fit - €25 Basic bike overhaul - fix flat tyres, lube chain, making the bike rideable again - €35 + material All coaching is private and one-on-one.

item.title: About
item.description: Ictia Coaching is a cycling coaching company that helps people develop themselves to be the best they can be. The main focus is on complete beginners and entry-level cyclists. Athletes receive support through one-on-one coaching, educational blogging and focused structured training plans. The mission is to help unique people achieve their personal goals. Helping unique people achieve personal goals My story I have been a cyclist whole my life.
